div.h3: Message from Our CEO/Principal Kelly S. Batiste
div.p: Welcome to all members of our "Fannie Family"!

We are embarking upon our 13th year as a learning institution for scholars in grades Pre-K through 8. Our school family will number about 600 students this year, each uniquely different and requiring the undivided attention of our school of educators and their parents.

Our mission is to provide each student with all that they need to achieve the highest academic success through collaboration of staff, parents, and community. This website is provided to keep parents and the community knowledgeable of the "mechanics" of our school community. Use it daily to keep fully abreast of all that you will need to know about Fannie C. Williams Charter School.

Within these digital pages, you can find Upcoming Events, the Breakfast and Lunch Menu, a digital copy of the Family Handbook, school procedures, pictures and archived copies of the newsletter–the Warrior News, etc. Let it be your first source of information regarding our campus.
Remember, FCWCS is a positive place for a child to learn and grow! Thanks for entrusting your child with us and let's have a great school year!
